Nutlope/llama-ocr

npm library for OCR using Llama 3.2 Vision, outputs markdown from images

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Extracts text from images using Apple Vision framework
  • Extracts text from images into structured Markdown
  • extracts text from images, screenshots, or PDFs using OCR, works offline, open source
  • Official code for GOT-OCR2.0, an end-to-end OCR model implementation
  • OCR utility for copying text from images or videos
  • Extracts text from images locally in the browser
  • Extracts text from images and PDFs using vision models through Ollama, available as Python package and web app
  • OCR pipeline with local LLM field extraction
  • Generates synthetic text images for OCR training
